s.text: Both of them lead rich nonvirtual lives in faraway locales, so we appreciate their involvement in and dedication to Slate's community bulletin board.
You must register in order to post a message (it's easy and free), but you can "lurk"--i.e.
Both of them lead rich nonvirtual lives in faraway locales, so we appreciate their involvement in and dedication to Slate's community bulletin board.
During her absence, two of our earliest and most energetic "Fraygrants" have been filling in.
